oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of a Union soldier as a boy and as a drummer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These two tintypes show the same soldier. One image is of the soldier as a boy in civilian clothing. The other image shows him as a drummer. The image shows the soldier posing with his drum and wearing a regulation, enlisted frock coat. The frock coat has veteran service stripes on each sleeve. The image is nicely tinted. The drum has the national eagle.
